name: Gyrostick
description:
GyrostickAbout the Game

Gyrostick is about a little stick that trys to gain as much of these energy points as possible while avoiding the red enemys.

The game was originally made for mobile devices. Gyrostick lives in your phone and stays always horizontally. It is made for steering the stick trough tilting your phone. 

Obviously this isn't possible while playing on a desktop device, so welcome magnetic stick :D It follows your mouse as you move it arround.

You can accelerate by typing left <- and right -> key as fast as possible.

Controls: TurnMouse movement
AccelerateA + D or <- + -> or MouseLeft + MouseRight or MouseWheel
Gameplay:
  • Collect the white points
  • Avoid the red dotted enemys
  • Gain multiplicator with collecting points fast enough
  • Try to get the greates highscore
Notes:
  •  In current state of development there is no online highscore list but you can post your highscores in the comment. It would make me happy to see how many points you can reach.
Change Notes:
  • v0.2.1
    • added mouse wheel support
  • v0.2.2
    • fixed randomization
    • added A+D and Mousbuttons as Input
